function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Scatter in combined data of all WWTP due to variations in virus RNA recovery and concentration in wastewater","Impact":"Inaccurate detection and monitoring of virus circulation levels in the population","Mitigation":"Standardizing virus RNA recovery methods and improving detection sensitivity","Technologies":"Advanced qRT-PCR assays and standardized sampling methods","People":"Population at risk due to inaccurate monitoring","Owner":"Public health organizations and wastewater treatment facilities"},{"Description":"Detection of virus in sewage before reported COVID-19 cases in the population","Impact":"Delayed response to virus outbreaks and potential for rapid spread of the disease","Mitigation":"Implement early warning systems based on sewage surveillance data","Technologies":"Real-time monitoring and data analysis tools","People":"Public health authorities and local government","Owner":"Research institutions and public health organizations"},{"Description":"Variability in SARS-CoV-2 RNA concentrations in city sewage","Impact":"Challenges in accurately estimating prevalence and assessing the effectiveness of containment measures","Mitigation":"Improving sewage sampling methods and data analysis techniques","Technologies":"Quantitative PCR assays and data modeling tools","People":"Public health agencies and policy makers","Owner":"Research institutions and government authorities"}]}
